```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)

```

# Page 1

### Plotly

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=4}
p <- ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = cut, fill = clarity)) +
            geom_bar(position = "dodge")
ggplotly(p)
```

### Heatmap

```{r}
d3heatmap(mtcars, scale="column", colors="Blues")
```

### Leaflet

```{r}
leaflet() %>% addTiles()
```
